mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie( movie_num, m_rank, m_title, m_titleEng, m_director, m_actor, m_nation, m_company, m_plot, m_runtime, m_rating, m_genre, m_opendate, m_poster, m_stillimg, m_vod) VALUES( movie_seq.nextval, #{m_rank}, #{m_title}, #{m_director}, #{m_actor}, #{m_nation}, #{m_company}, #{m_plot}, #{m_runtime}, #{m_rating}, #{m_genre}, #{m_opendate}, #{m_poster}, #{m_stillimg}, #{m_vod}) )
